id: Blog Manager+ Notion Template for SEO

features: Easy Blog Management:Use our Notion template for hassle-free blog organization.; Write and Edit:Create and modify your articles within the template.; Article Tracking:Quickly view and manage pending articles.; Keyword Organization:Efficiently sort and link keywords to your articles.; Multiple Projects:Handle several blog projects simultaneously.; Blog Outline:Copy & Paste a pre-made layout, saving you time.; Automated Blog Posting:Guide toAutomate Blog Posting from Notion to Wordpress.
